headline: META vs. MSFT: Which AI Leader Offers Better Long-Term Returns?
summary: Both Meta (META) and Microsoft (MSFT) are at the forefront of the AI revolution. However, which investment is likely to deliver stronger long-term returns? Based on my analysis, Microsoft is better positioned for long-term stock performance, given its stable monetization strategy and significantly more attractive valuation. While I remain bullish on both investments, my preference is heavily skewed toward buying Microsoft over Meta at this time. Meta Has Been Stealthily Winning the AI Arms Race
